name: autotest.de (Caroo Group)
overview:
autotest.de is a German-language review platform offering usersâ€™ experience and tips on cars. The independent portal provides first-hand information, practical experience and reviews that are really helpful. At the click of the mouse button, users of the free online site can easily find reports and tips that not only provide important information prior to purchasing a car. The site also covers the right handling of the car, as well as the correct servicing and repairs. The siteâ€™s unique features are the individual impressions of â€œprivateâ€œ car reviews instead of test reports by professional journalists. autotest.de allows motorists to become part of the community by contributing text and photos and provide transparency in the â€œcar jungleâ€œ with their reviews, critical and positive comments â€“ and thus provide a free service, helping other buyers to make a decision.

autotest.de is part of the Caroo Group based in Cologne, developing innovative services for private users and commercial partners on the German online car market and covering the entire car retailing process â€“ from decision making up to the actual purchase. pkw.de, caroo.de, autotest.de: With its three strong brands, the Caroo Group like hardly any other company in Germany offers a wide range of services for efficient car trading on the Internet. The German company is managed by its experienced founder Boris Polenske, who as Managing Director and Partner has been responsible for the successful expansion of Caroo GmbH since July 2008.
